name: WP Article Audit using Google Analytics
author: Indibits

sections.description: Many articles on your website do not get any traffic over a period of time. Some SEO experts suggest removing those articles from the website for a better SEO. This plugin analyses the data of the website on Google Analytics and suggests you the articles which you may consider to remove. The plugin also provides a good interface to easily remove those articles.
sections.installation:
• Install the plugin normally and activate.
  • Then click on \”GA Article Audit\” on the menu at the left-hand side.
  • Click on the \”Get Authentication\” link and follow the steps. You will get authentication code.
  • Copy the authentication code and paste on the authentication code field on \”GA Article Audit\” page and save.
  • On the next page, choose Google Analytics profile and set other filters and save changes.
  • Now you can see all the pages which have less number of views than the number of views you have set on the settings.
  • You can edit, send to draft or trash those articles.

short_description: A WordPress plugin to help you audit your articles posted on your WordPress blog with the help of Google Analytics data of the website.
description: Many articles on your website do not get any traffic over a period of time. Some SEO experts suggest removing those articles from the website for a better SEO. This plugin analyses the data of the website on Google Analytics and suggests you the articles which you may consider to remove. The plugin also provides a good interface to easily remove those articles.
